item.title: Code - Email com Google Authentication
item.description: Voce pode clonar o reposit√≥rio: email-google-auth. GoogleAuthenticator.py import os.path from google.auth.transport.requests import Request from google.oauth2.credentials import Credentials from google_auth_oauthlib.flow import InstalledAppFlow from googleapiclient.discovery import build from googleapiclient.errors import HttpError def authenticator(client_secret_file, api_service_name, api_version, *scopes): CLIENT_SECRET_FILE = client_secret_file API_SERVICE_NAME = api_service_name API_VERSION = api_version SCOPES = [scope for scope in scopes[0]] creds = None if os.path.exists('token.json'): creds = Credentials.from_authorized_user_file( 'token.json', SCOPES) if not creds or not creds.valid: if creds and creds.expired and creds.
